thread.title: Hall of Famer Greg Maddux pulled off a spectacular prank on Kris Bryant | For The Win
thread.title_full: Hall of Famer Greg Maddux pulled off a spectacular prank on Kris Bryant | For The Win

author: Maggie Hendricks
title: Hall of Famer Greg Maddux pulled off a spectacular prank on Kris Bryant | For The Win
text:
Hall of Famer Greg Maddux pulled off a spectacular prank on Kris Bryant Hall of Famer Greg Maddux pulled off a spectacular prank on Kris Bryant Hall of Famer Greg Maddux pulled off a spectacular prank on Kris Bryant By Maggie Hendricks February 16, 2017 11:21 am 1.8k shares email By: Maggie Hendricks | February 16, 2017 11:21 am 
Last season, Kris Bryant pranked the baseball team at Mesa Community College . To start this season, the tables were turned. 
Hall of Famer Greg Maddux — who looks much like musician Dave Grohl when in a wig and hat — was the “sound guy” for Bryant’s batting practice. When the coach had to leave, the sound guy took over pitching, and Bryant struggled, saying, “This sound guy’s got a good curve ball!” 
The amazing thing here? Maddux will turn 51 in April. He pitched for 23 years in the Major Leagues. He still has an arm that gives trouble to the reigning National League MVP. More MLB!
